article: the trial of five alleged islamic militants accused of involvement in a deadly attack on the us consulate in karachi moved ahead thursday after a dozen adjournments , when the state prosecutor finally showed up in the courtroom .
abstract: us consulate bombing case in pakistan finally gets prosecutor
